scripts.build:html: for f in frontend/src/*.html; do html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true $f -o build/$(basename $f); done
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p build/js && for f in frontend/src/js/*.js; do uglifyjs $f -o build/js/$(basename $f .js).min.js; done
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:assets && echo "Build completed successfully!"
